entities.name: gringotts bank
entities.description: Gringotts bank is mentioned as the location where the vault is supposed to be.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as saying 'I see'.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as smugly responding to Ted's question.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group that Griphook did not bother telling about the information.

entities.name: gornuk
entities.description: Gornuk is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as laughing along with Dirk.

entities.name: dirk
entities.description: Dirk is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as laughing along with Gornuk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as closing his eyes and willing someone to ask him a question.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is mentioned as having an ex-boyfriend in common with Dean.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a person who is part of the conversation and is mentioned as being an ex-boyfriend of Ginny's.

relationships.description: Griphook did not bother telling the Death Eaters about the information.
Ted asked Griphook a question, to which Griphook responded smugly.
Harry wanted information from Dean, and after a minute, Dean obliged by answering Harry's question.
Ginny had an ex-boyfriend in common with Dean.
